name: The Blue Peril - Combat edition
description:
If you get extreme screen tearing consider playing the web version instead. Not sure what causes it but it just disappeared for me when I tabbed in and out of the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------
Most of your abilities cost mana and you get mana back by grazing enemy bullets or using your sword attack.

Xbox controls:

Sword attack: X
Dash: LB
Heal: A (Hold a few seconds)
Fire: RT
Laser: RB
Sprint: LT
Slowmotion: B
--
PC controls
Sword attack: Right Mouse Button
Dash: Space
Heal: Q (Hold a few seconds)
Fire: Left Mouse Button
Laser: Middle Mouse Button
Sprint: Left Shift
Slowmotion: 2
